Name: Rerolls
Effect: Two selectable options, one of which is "reroll 6s" and one of which is "reroll all failures"

Name: Deadly Blades
Effect: Failed defense rolls of 6 cause 2 wounds instead of 1

Name: Flawless Strikes
Effect: Hit rolls of 1 set the defense value to 0 for those hits

Name: Hardened
Effect: Numeric value that decreases cleave from the attacker by that much to minimum 0

Name: Indominable
Effect: Numeric value that ignores that many failed morale saves, prioritizing failed 6s after rerolls

Name: Oblivious
Effect: Only suffer 1 damage for every 2 failed morale checks

Name: Relentless Blows
Effect: Hit rolls of 1 generate 2 hits instead of 1

Name: Tenacious
Effect: Numeric value that ignores that many failed defense rolls, prioritizing failed 6s after rerolls

Name: Torrential Fire
Effect: After rolling hits, generate another hit for every 2 hits you rolled

Name: Defensive Rerolls
Effect: Two selectable options, one of which is "reroll 6s" against hits and one of which is "reroll all failures" against hits

Name: Morale Rerolls
Effect: Two selectable options, one of which is "reroll 6s" against failed morale and one of which is "reroll all failures" against failed morale
